Khonkolor/Nightstrike::

"However"replied Khonkolor with a smile "would be good idea that we 
help Epyon?"

Nightstrike moved back a voiding the whip, he shot against Epyon his 
Twin Razor Boomerang Disks.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod/Epyon::
> 
> Hot Rod turned to Khonkolor.
> "Dont you mean 'all for one, and one for all'?"
> 
> Epyon jumped from the shots.
> "It figures he would come after me first."
> From Rpyon's shield extends a heavy metal link whip. It also glows 
with
> energy. He whips it at Nightstrike, trying to slash his chest.
